I'm a Social Data Scientist with a background in Political Science, applied quantitative methods, causal inference, and programming in <i class="fab fa-r-project"></i>.



A former PhD student at the [Department of Political Science (UCPH)](https://politicalscience.ku.dk), I currently work as a consultant/analyst/data scientist for a private Danish consultancy firm.
